features.createFeature: Wishes can be anything, like fun stuff, interesting items, or something for a special occasion.
features.accessFeature: All your wishlists can be shared with friends, family or colleagues very easely.

wishlists.title: Wishlists
wishlists.noResults: You don't have any wishes at the moment.

landingPage.paragraphMain: Did you ever tell anyone all your wishes?
landingPage.paragraphSecondary: {{websiteName}} is place where you can take care of all your wishes!
landingPage.storesDescription: We support lot of stores around the world! These are the most used.
landingPage.howToUseTitle: Make a wish in 3 simple steps
landingPage.howToUseDescription: With our easy and fast approach you are seconds away of your wishes.
landingPage.categorySectionDescription: There's lots of product categories you can wish and put into your wish list. Here we listed just few of them.
